Html: I feel like a real noob here, but have searched for ages for how to apply a changeset (48059 that fixes TankDK etc) to 2.3.12. Can someone let me know where to unzip or how to apply the changeset ( I did manage to find it and know how to Unzip :p)
You can't just apply a changeset to the release. You have to fully download the source code and compile it yourself, and you'll end up with all the changesets since the last release.
Thanks for the quick reply, looks I will have to wait for the next release, ain't no programmer and don't want to start yet ;-)
